channel.title: A weird question about all players lvls
channel.description: ok i have a question... is it possible to make every one on my server back to lvl 1 slayer? WITH OUT going threw every players file and doing it manualy?

item.title: A weird question about all players lvls
item.dc:creator: @butnugget butnugget
item.description:
@butnugget wrote:

this doesn’t work…

i only need to reset every ones slayer to lvl 1… one time only… i don’t want to to stay lvl 1 for ever…

Read full topic
item.source: A weird question about all players lvls

item.title: A weird question about all players lvls
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

try adding this under public boolean process

playerLevel[18] == 1

add DIRECTLY UNDER it
just a thought
probly wont work and will probly bring it to 1/LVL
which would mean like if you have 50/50 slayer that would make it 1/50
but try anyway
